Verses: 1 o, Thaagamaayirukkiravargale, Neengal Ellaarum Thanneergalandaikku Vaarungal; Panamillaadhavargale, Neengal Vandhu, Vaangi Saappidungal; Neengal Vandhu, Panamumindri Vilaiyumindri Dhraatcharasamum Paalumkollungal.

2 neengal Appamallaadhadharkaagap Panaththaiyum, Thirupthiseyyaadha Porulukkaaga Ungal Prayaasaththaiyum Selavazhippaanen? Neengal Enakku Gavanamaai Sevikoduththu Nalamaanadhai Saappidungal; Appozhudhu Ungal Aaththumaa Kozhuppaana Padhaarththaththinaal Magizhchchiyaagum.

3 ungal Seviyai Saaiththu, Ennidaththil Vaarungal: Kelungal, Appozhudhu Ungal Aaththumaa Pizhaikkum; Dhaaveedhukku Arulina Nichchayamaana Kirubaigalai Ungalukku Niththiya Udanpadikkaiyaaga Erpaduththuven.
4 idho, Avarai Janakkoottangalukku Saatchiyaagavum, Janangalukkuth Thalaivaraagavum Adhipadhiyaagavum Erpaduththinen.

5 idho, Nee Ariyaadhirundha Jaadhiyai Varavazhaippaai; Unnai Ariyaadhirundha Jaadhi Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Nimiththamum, Israveludaiya Parisuththarin Nimiththamum Unnidaththirku Odivarum; Avar Unnai Menmaipaduththiyirukkiraar.
6 karththaraik Kandadaiyaththakka Samayaththil Avaraith Thedungal; Avar Sameebamaayirukkaiyil Avarai Nokkik Kooppidungal.

7 dhunmaarkkan Than Vazhiyaiyum, Akkiramakkaaran Than Ninaivugalaiyumvittu, Karththaridaththil Thirumbakkadavan; Avar Avanmel Manadhuruguvaar; Nammudaiya Dhevanidaththirke Thirumbakkadavan; Avar Mannikkiradharku Dhayai Peruththirukkiraar.
8 en Ninaivugal Ungal Ninaivugal Alla; Ungal Vazhigal En Vazhigalum Allavendru Karththar Sollugiraar.
9 boomiyaippaarkkilum Vaanangal Eppadi Uyarndhirukkiradho, Appadiye Ungal Vazhigalaippaarkkilum En Vazhigalum, Ungal Ninaivugalaippaarkkilum En Ninaivugalum Uyarndhirukkiradhu.

10 maariyum Uraindha Mazhaiyum Vaanaththilirundhu Irangi, Avvidaththukkuth Thirumbaamal Boomiyai Nanaiththu, Adhil Mulai Kilambi Vilaiyumpadichcheydhu, Vidhaikkiravanukku Vidhaiyaiyum, Pusikkiravanukku Aagaaraththaiyum Kodukkiradhu Eppadiyo,
11 appadiye En Vaayilirundhu Purappadum Vasanamum Irukkum, Adhu Verumaiyaai Ennidaththirkuth Thirumbaamal, Adhu Naan Virumbugiradhaichcheydhu, Naan Adhai Anuppina Kaariyamaagumpadi Vaaikkum.
12 neengal Magizhchchiyaaip Purappattu, Samaadhaanamaaik Kondupogappaduveergal, Parvadhangalum Malaigalum Ungalukku Munbaaga Gembeeramaai Muzhangi, Veliyin Marangalellaam Kaikottum.

13 mutchedikkup Padhilaaga Dhevadhaaru Virutcham Mulaikkum, Kaanjorikkup Padhilaaga Mirudhuchchedi Ezhumbum; Adhu Karththarukkuk Keerththiyaagavum, Nirmoolamaagaadha Niththiya Adaiyaalamaagavum Irukkum.
